titleStmt.title: A guide to juries setting forth their antiquity, power and duty from the Common-law and statutes : with a table / by a person of quality ; also a letter, to the author, upon the same subject.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.
Maynard, John, Sir, 1602-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
